snippet: The Arizona Diamondbacks acquired closer Addison Reed from the Chicago White Sox in exchange for a third-base prospect, Matt Davidson.
abstract: Arizona Diamondbacks acquire closer Addison Reed from the Chicago White Sox in exchange for a third-base prospect, Matt Davidson.
lead_paragraph: The Arizona Diamondbacks acquired closer Addison Reed from the Chicago White Sox in exchange for a third-base prospect, Matt Davidson.

headline.main: Arizona Deals for Closer Addison Reed
